title: No children node listing when changing data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab, there is no list of children nodes displayed.
EB: The list of children nodes should be displayed when changing the data source.
SR:
1. Create a new dataset without an SQL statement. 
2. The new data source should have no database/table/column information. 
3. Change the data source for the dataset. 
4. Verify that the list of children nodes is displayed. 
5. Close the dataset editor and reopen it to confirm that the children nodes are still listed.
